name: Shaik Abdul Muheeth
tagline: a Web Developer passionate about creating innovative and user-friendly online experiences.
about_me: I'm Shaik Abdul Muheeth, a passionate web developer specializing in creating dynamic and engaging websites and I have strong background in React.js, JavaScript, Express.js, python, and MongoDB. I recently completed my undergraduate degree in Computer Science. I am currently working as a Programme Analyst Trainee at Cognizant, where I'm exploring the exciting world of IoT and automation, as a trainee I am learning about how to document values, design recipes and test using Siemens Ops Center. I am enthusiastic about taking on new challenges and enjoy collaborating with teams to bring innovative ideas to life. I am always eager to expand my skill set and tackle new projects head-on.

work.description: I am exploring the exciting realm of IoT and work automation. In this role as a trainee I learning about documenting values, designing recipes, and testing using Siemens Ops Center.

During this Internship I had the opportunity to contribute to the development of e-learning and e-commerce platforms by working with WordPress, I added and modified new features, enabling seamless user experiences and improved functionality.

Achievements.title: Open Source
Achievements.description: Contributed to an Open Source project like IVY and now actively taking part in ReactPlay Open Source by creating 2+ issues and trying to solve them by generating pull requests.

Achievements.title: Skills
Achievements.description: ReactJS, Javascript,ExpressJS, MongoDB, Python, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap5, MUI, GIT.
